title: Mellanna Siripalo Lyrics Theneer Viduthi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Kousik, Mirudula
Song : Mellanna Siripalo
Lyrics : Murugan Manthiram
Music Director : SS Kumaran

Mellanna Siripalo, Jillena muraipalo,
En kannai imai thindrathe.
Kannukul vizhundhalo, kallukul mulaithalo
En nenjam ennai vendradhe.
kadhal ennum siragugal ennakena tharuvaalo
vaanam thaandi parandhida thunai enna varuvaalo ohh..

Mellanna Siripalo, Jillena muraipalo,
En kannai imai thindrathe.

Pandhakaran muli onnum sariyillakaa..
Moonu mudich-onnu poda sollukaa...

Eno adi eno, en idhayam mella udaithaai
Theeyaai oru theeyaai, uyril vandhu kudhithaai
Ennakena unnai padaithavan vandhal,
aayiram nanri solven
Aayidham indri por onru seithaai,
arai nodi ennai vendrai
Alzhaga iva-la-le, adiyodu thozhaindhene

Mellanna Siripalo, Jillena muraipalo,
En kannai imai thindrathe.
Kannukul vizhundhalo, kallukul mulaithalo
En nenjam ennai vendradhe.
